tasks.label: Run ReactPrj
tasks.command: Set "_tempvar=" && if not exist ${workspaceFolder}/node_modules/@sap/html5-repo-mock/index.js Set "_tempvar=1" && if not exist ${workspaceFolder}/node_modules/@sap/approuter/approuter.js Set "_tempvar=1" && if %_tempvar% EQU 1 (npm i @sap/approuter && npm i @sap/html5-repo-mock)

tasks.label: Build ReactPrj
tasks.command: if not exist ${workspaceFolder}/app/build ( npm run build-app )
